title: New: Prom – Annie
content:
A single Berninger-esque baritone and an overpowering sense of shame, disillusionment and lust make up the majority of Annie, this new track from Toronto’s mysteriously titled Prom.

So the production leaves a little to be desired at times, but the songwriting intent and talent is clearly there, as is the lyrical efficiency; with each and every line pronounced with a meaning that could only be born from experience. Tagged as ‘drunken nights’ and ‘unnecessary fights’, Annie is the girl you could never let go of, yet who held your heart through it all… and this song is for her.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
